title: Random/Multiple Cylinder Misfire Detected
description: The PCM detected multiple random misfires across cylinders.
causes: Worn spark plugs or ignition coils

title: Catalyst System Efficiency Below Threshold (Bank 1)
description: Catalytic converter efficiency is below threshold.

title: System Too Lean (Bank 1)
description: The air-fuel mixture is too lean on bank 1.
